accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: An appointment for research is required. The collection is open for research. No interlibrary loan.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Originally part of McConnell Library's Virginia Documents and regional materials files in the 1930s and 40s.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Virginia Historical Documents collection contains official Virginia Documents publications, regional publications, flyers, pamphlets, magazines, and other publications that were originally part of McConnell Library's Virginia Documents and regional materials files in the 1930s and 40s. This one box 10 folder collection further features such items as Radford City Documents that include the member roll of the Tyler Presbyterian Church from 1944, copies of the publication the Citizen c. 1940's and Virginia Garden Club information from the 1930's and 1970's.

blockquote.p: Folder 3: Virginia History and Assorted Publications
Folder 7: Regional education and literary publications
Folder 9: Reports on Virgina housing, farming, labor relations, cooperative extension services
Folder 10: Virginia Legal documents and reports, 1930s
